content: next stitch * twice 2scinc in the next stitch single_crochet the last stitch 12 row 4 chain 1 turn 2scinc in the first stitch single_crochet in each of the next 2 stitches *2hdcinc half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 stitches * twice 2scinc in the next stitch single_crochet each of the last 2 stitches 16 change to white yarn row 5 chain 1 turn 2scinc in the first stitch single_crochet in each of the next 3 stitches *2hdcinc half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 stitches * twice 2scinc in the next stitch single_crochet each of the last 3 stitches 20 row 6 chain 1 turn 2scinc in the first stitch single_crochet in each of the next 4 stitches *2hdcinc half_double_crochet in each of the next 4 stitches * twice 2scinc in the next stitch single_crochet each of the last 4 stitches 24 change to yellow yarn row 7 chain 1 turn 2scinc in the first stitch single_crochet in each of the next 5 stitches *2hdcinc half_double_crochet in each of the next 5 stitches * twice 2scinc in the next stitch single_crochet each of the last 5 stitches 28 row 8 chain 1 turn 2scinc in the first stitch single_crochet in each of the next 6 stitches *2hdcinc half_double_crochet in each of the next 6 stitches * twice 2scinc in the next stitch single_crochet each of the last 6 stitches 32 end- cut yarn leaving a 20 inch yarn tail and pull thru last stitch you will use this yarn tail to sew the rainbow patch to the body piece first arrange the rainbow at the body so that the flat portion aligns with the sewn edge of the body with yarn tail sew all along the rainbow to secure i hope you have enjoyed my pattern if you have any questions along the way please feel free to email me at amygaines123@yahoo com thank you 4
